publications.title: Voltage Gated Calcium Channel Dysregulation May Contribute to Neurological Symptoms in Calmodulinopathies.
publications.text_hl: Calmodulinopathies are caused by <m>mutations</m> in @GENE_CALM1 @GENE_801 @@@calmodulin@@@ (@GENE_CALM1 @GENE_801 @@@CaM@@@), and result in debilitating @DISEASE_Arrhythmias_Cardiac @DISEASE_MESH:D001145 @@@cardiac arrythmias@@@ such as @DISEASE_Long_QT_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D008133 @@@long-QT <m>syndrome</m>@@@ (@DISEASE_Long_QT_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D008133 @@@LQTS@@@) and @DISEASE_Polymorphic_catecholergic_ventricular_tachycardia @DISEASE_MESH:C536334 @@@catecholaminergic polymorphic ventricular tachycardia@@@ (@DISEASE_Polymorphic_catecholergic_ventricular_tachycardia @DISEASE_MESH:C536334 @@@CPVT@@@).

publications.title: Combined Abrocitinib and Acitretin Therapy for Darier's Disease: A Case Report
publications.text_hl: @DISEASE_Darier_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D007644 @@@DD@@@ results from an @GENE_ATP2A2 @GENE_488 @@@ATP2A2@@@ <m>mutation</m>. The @GENE_ATP2A2 @GENE_488 @@@ATP2A2@@@ <m>gene</m> is located at 12q23-24.1 on chromosome 12, encoding sarco/endoplasmic reticulum ATPase type 2 (@GENE_ATP2A2 @GENE_488 @@@SERCA2@@@).

Could Low Serum TWEAK Levels Serve as a Biomarker for Children and Adolescents Diagnosed with ADHD, Specifically the Predominantly Inattentive Subtype?
publications.text_hl: @GENE_TNFSF12 @GENE_8742 @@@TNF-related weak inducer of apoptosis@@@ (@GENE_TNFSF12 @GENE_8742 @@@TWEAK@@@) is a secreted ligand in membrane-bound and soluble <m>variant</m> forms belonging to the @GENE_TNF @GENE_7124 @@@TNF@@@ superfamily members.
